sentences.english: It depends on which country you are planning to go.
sentences.chinese: 考哪種試是得依據外國粹校的請求的。

sentences.english: Peking Opera, a comprehensive form of stage art, is a well-known cultural symbol of China.
sentences.chinese: 京劇是我國的國粹之一，是一種舞臺藝術的綜合表現。

sentences.english: After the War of Resistance Against Japan broke out, the thought of quintessence of Chinese traditional music declined rapidly too.
sentences.chinese: 抗戰全面爆發後，國粹主義音樂思潮也迅速走向衰落。

sentences.english: Tusk is another epitome of Chinese ornamental design. It is the typical representative of Guangdong ivory craft skills.
sentences.chinese: 仿牙雕是中國的另一國粹，爲典型的廣東牙雕風格。

sentences.english: They are a real treasure in Chinese and indeed world literature. In 278B.
sentences.chinese: 這些作品是中國文學乃至世界文學中真正的國粹。

sentences.english: Going to study in your business schools is one of the top choices of Chinese students.
sentences.chinese: 去貴國商學院修業成爲了我國粹子們的首選之一。

sentences.english: Chinese martial arts is the most important Chinese cultural legacy and world-famous with a long history.
sentences.chinese: 中國武術歷史悠久，是中華文化的國粹，聞名世界。

sentences.english: Peking opera of China is a national treasure with a history of 200 years.
sentences.chinese: 京劇是中國的國粹，迄今已有200多年的歷史。

sentences.english: Please enjoy the "National Essence Movement" from Grade One.
sentences.chinese: 請欣賞一年級組帶來的《國粹樂章》。

definition: to develop/to make full use of
lit. source is distant and the flow is long (idiom); fig. sth goes back to the dim and distant past/a lot of water has flowed under the bridge since then

military skill or technique (in former times)/all kinds of martial art sports (some claiming spiritual development)/self-defense/tradition of choreographed fights from opera and film (recent usage)/also called kungfu 功夫/CL:種|种[zhong3]
Yangzhong county level city in Zhenjiang 鎮江|镇江[Zhen4 jiang1], Jiangsu
traceable to the same stock (idiom); of a common origin (of trends, ideas etc)
to pass on (to future generations)/passed on (from former times)/a continued tradition/an inheritance
a sage/wise and holy man/virtuous ruler/Buddhist lama/wine
